testname: Invoice Creation - Step 1 Bill From Section
description: Test the Bill From section in Step 1 of invoice creation wizard. Verify all required fields can be filled, validation works correctly, and data persists when navigating between steps.

steps.stepDescription: Open the browser and navigate to https://invoify.vercel.app.
Ensure the invoice creation wizard opens at Step 1 with the Bill From section clearly visible.
Fill in all the required fields in the Bill From section with valid data.
Clear one required field intentionally and attempt to proceed to trigger the validation message.
Verify that the proper validation error message appears for the empty required field.
Re-enter valid data into the field that previously failed validation.
Click the Continue button to navigate to the next step of the invoice creation wizard.
Navigate back to Step 1 to verify that the data entered in the Bill From section persists.
Confirm that all previously entered data is still visible and correct in the Bill From fields.
Take a screenshot of the completed Bill From step to document the test results.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Test the Bill From section in Step 1 of invoice creation wizard. Verify all required fields can be filled, validation works correctly, and data persists when navigating between steps.

testname: Invoice Creation - Step 1 Bill To Section
description: Test the Bill To section in Step 1 of invoice creation wizard. Verify receiver information can be filled, validation works, and data persists when navigating between steps.

steps.stepDescription: Open the browser and navigate to the invoify application URL.
Wait for the invoice creation wizard to load and display the Bill To section in Step 1.
Enter receiver details in the Bill To section, filling all required fields with valid information.
Trigger form validation by attempting to proceed with incomplete or incorrect receiver information to check for error messages.
Correct any validation errors by updating the receiver information with proper data in the Bill To fields.
Proceed to the next step of the invoice creation wizard to test navigation.
Navigate back to Step 1 of the wizard to verify that the previously entered Bill To data persists.
Confirm that the receiver information entered in the Bill To section remains unchanged and correctly displayed.
Capture a screenshot of the final state of Step 1 with the Bill To details to document the successful test outcome.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Test the Bill To section in Step 1 of invoice creation wizard. Verify receiver information can be filled, validation works, and data persists when navigating between steps.

description: Test template selection functionality. Verify that users can switch between Template 1 and Template 2, and that the live preview updates immediately when template is changed.

steps.stepDescription: Open the web browser and navigate to the URL https://invoify.vercel.app
Wait for the landing page to load and verify that the main interface is visible
Locate and select Template 1 from the available template options
Confirm that the live preview updates immediately to reflect Template 1 changes
Locate and select Template 2 from the available template options
Confirm that the live preview updates immediately to reflect Template 2 changes
Take a screenshot of the updated template preview for verification

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Test template selection functionality. Verify that users can switch between Template 1 and Template 2, and that the live preview updates immediately when template is changed.

description: Test logo upload functionality in invoice templates. Verify that users can upload a logo image, it displays correctly in both templates, and the logo persists when switching between templates.

steps.stepDescription: Launch the web browser and navigate to the invoify application URL 'https://invoify.vercel.app'.
Locate the invoice templates section where logo editing is available.
Identify the option to upload a logo image in the template interface.
Select a valid logo image file to upload using the upload functionality provided.
Verify that the uploaded logo appears correctly in the current invoice template preview.
Switch to a different invoice template within the application.
Confirm that the previously uploaded logo persists and is displayed correctly in the new template.
Take a final screenshot to capture the state of the invoice templates displaying the logo.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Test logo upload functionality in invoice templates. Verify that users can upload a logo image, it displays correctly in both templates, and the logo persists when switching between templates.

description: Test live preview functionality. Verify that changes made in the form fields are immediately reflected in the live preview panel, and that the preview updates in real-time as users type or modify data.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to the invoify live preview URL (https://invoify.vercel.app).
Wait for the page to fully load and ensure the live preview panel is visible.
Identify the form fields on the page that correspond to invoice details.
Enter sample data into the invoice form fields to simulate a user typing.
Observe the live preview panel to confirm that the entered data is immediately reflected.
Modify the data in the form fields and verify that the live preview updates dynamically as changes are made.
Confirm that all changes are accurately shown in the preview without needing a manual refresh.
Take a screenshot of the live preview panel to document the final state after all modifications.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Test live preview functionality. Verify that changes made in the form fields are immediately reflected in the live preview panel, and that the preview updates in real-time as users type or modify data.

testname: Live Preview System - Wizard Step Synchronization
description: Test live preview synchronization with wizard steps. Verify that the preview updates correctly when navigating between different steps of the invoice creation wizard.

steps.stepDescription: Open the web browser and navigate to the URL 'https://invoify.vercel.app'.
Wait until the homepage loads and the invoice creation wizard is visible.
Identify and select the initial step of the invoice creation wizard, confirming that the live preview displays the default invoice details.
Navigate to the next wizard step and observe that the live preview updates to reflect the new invoice details.
Proceed to another step in the wizard and verify that the live preview synchronizes with the updated information.
Scroll if necessary through the wizard to ensure all live preview changes are visible and accurate.
Navigate back to a previous wizard step and confirm that the live preview reverts to display the corresponding data.
Capture a final screenshot of the wizard steps and the updated live preview to verify successful synchronization.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Test live preview synchronization with wizard steps. Verify that the preview updates correctly when navigating between different steps of the invoice creation wizard.

description: Test signature drawing functionality. Verify that users can draw signatures using mouse/touch input, the signature appears correctly, and can be saved and displayed in the invoice.

steps.stepDescription: Launch the web browser and navigate to https://invoify.vercel.app
Wait for the page to load fully and ensure the signature drawing canvas is visible
Use the mouse or touch input to draw a signature on the designated canvas
Confirm that the drawn signature appears correctly within the signature area
Click the save or submit button to store the signature
Navigate to the invoice section and verify that the saved signature is displayed properly
Capture a final screenshot of the invoice displaying the signature to complete the test

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Test signature drawing functionality. Verify that users can draw signatures using mouse/touch input, the signature appears correctly, and can be saved and displayed in the invoice.

description: Test typed signature functionality. Verify that users can type signatures using different fonts, change font styles, and the typed signature appears correctly in the invoice.

steps.stepDescription: Open the web browser and navigate to the invoice application's URL: https://invoify.vercel.app.
Locate the section for adding a typed signature within the invoice interface.
Type a sample signature into the designated input field for the signature.
Select a different font from the available font options to see the signature change.
Change the font style (e.g., italic, bold) using the provided style controls.
Wait for the invoice preview to update and display the newly styled typed signature.
Verify that the signature appears correctly in the invoice with the chosen font and style.
Capture a screenshot of the completed invoice to confirm the correct display of the signature.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Test typed signature functionality. Verify that users can type signatures using different fonts, change font styles, and the typed signature appears correctly in the invoice.

description: Test signature upload functionality. Verify that users can upload signature images, the uploaded signature displays correctly, and file validation works properly.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to the invoify page at https://invoify.vercel.app
Confirm that the homepage loads successfully by checking for key elements on the page
Locate the signature upload area on the page, ensuring it is visible for interaction
Upload a valid signature image file from your system using the provided upload function
Verify that the uploaded signature image is displayed correctly on the page
Attempt to upload a file of an unsupported type to test file validation rules
Ensure that an appropriate error message is displayed for the invalid file upload
Capture a screenshot of the final state to confirm that the signature upload functionality works as expected

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Test signature upload functionality. Verify that users can upload signature images, the uploaded signature displays correctly, and file validation works properly.

description: Test line item calculations. Verify that quantity and unit price calculations work correctly, totals are computed automatically, and subtotals update in real-time.

steps.stepDescription: Open the browser and go to the URL https://invoify.vercel.app
Wait for the invoice application to fully load and display the line items section
Enter a specific value in the quantity field for a line item
Enter a specific value in the unit price field for the same line item
Verify that the total for the line item is computed automatically based on the quantity and unit price
Update the quantity value and observe that the subtotal and total fields update in real-time
Confirm that all line item calculations reflect the correct multiplication results
Take a screenshot of the final invoice with updated calculations to verify the completed task

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Test line item calculations. Verify that quantity and unit price calculations work correctly, totals are computed automatically, and subtotals update in real-time.

description: Test tax calculation functionality. Verify that tax can be applied as percentage or fixed amount, calculations are accurate, and the total updates correctly with tax included.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to the invoicing application at https://invoify.vercel.app
Verify that the invoice interface and tax calculation section are visible on the page
Enter a base invoice amount in the amount field to be used for tax calculations
Select the tax type option for percentage from the available tax settings
Enter a tax percentage value, for example 10, into the tax input field
Verify that the calculated tax amount reflects 10% of the base amount and that the total is updated accordingly
Switch the tax setting to a fixed amount option from the available tax settings
Enter a fixed tax value, for example 50, into the tax input field
Verify that the tax amount is set to the fixed value and that the total invoice amount is updated correctly with the fixed tax included
Scroll down if necessary to ensure all updated calculations are visible on the page
Take a screenshot of the completed tax calculation results to record the test outcome

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Test tax calculation functionality. Verify that tax can be applied as percentage or fixed amount, calculations are accurate, and the total updates correctly with tax included.

description: Test discount and shipping calculations. Verify that discounts can be applied as percentage or fixed amount, shipping costs are calculated correctly, and all calculations update the final total properly.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to https://invoify.vercel.app
Wait for the invoice page to load completely ensuring all calculation fields are visible
Enter a percentage discount value in the designated discount input field
Click the apply discount button to update the invoice with the percentage discount
Verify that the invoice recalculates the discount correctly and updates the total with the applied percentage discount
Clear the discount field and enter a fixed discount amount in the discount input field
Click the apply discount button so the system recalculates the fixed discount on the invoice
Verify that the fixed discount is correctly applied and that the updated total reflects the fixed discount adjustment
Enter the shipping cost into the appropriate shipping cost field
Review the invoice summary to confirm that the shipping cost has been added correctly to the final total
Take a screenshot of the final invoice summary to capture the final state with all calculations updated

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Test discount and shipping calculations. Verify that discounts can be applied as percentage or fixed amount, shipping costs are calculated correctly, and all calculations update the final total properly.

description: Test PDF generation and download functionality. Verify that users can generate PDF invoices, download them successfully, and the PDF contains all invoice data correctly formatted.

steps.stepDescription: Open the web browser and navigate to the URL: https://invoify.vercel.app
Ensure that the homepage loads successfully and the invoice generation feature is visible
Locate and navigate to the section or module where PDF invoices can be generated
Initiate the PDF invoice generation by clicking on the appropriate button or link
Wait until the system confirms that the PDF invoice is generated and ready for download
Download the generated PDF invoice and verify that the download completes without errors
Open the downloaded PDF invoice and review the content to ensure all invoice data is correctly formatted and complete
Capture a screenshot of the final page or PDF preview to document the successful completion of the test

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Test PDF generation and download functionality. Verify that users can generate PDF invoices, download them successfully, and the PDF contains all invoice data correctly formatted.

description: Test email distribution functionality. Verify that users can send invoices via email, the email contains the PDF attachment, and the email delivery works correctly.

steps.stepDescription: Open the web browser and navigate to the invoify application URL.
Wait for the invoify homepage to load completely and confirm that the dashboard is visible.
Navigate to the invoice email distribution section or locate the option to send an invoice via email.
Enter the recipient's email address in the designated field for sending the invoice.
Ensure that the invoice details are populated automatically and that a PDF attachment is attached as part of the invoice.
Click or tap the button to send the invoice email, initiating the distribution process.
Verify that a confirmation message appears indicating that the email has been successfully sent, ensuring the PDF attachment is referenced in the confirmation.
Check the email delivery logs or test email inbox to confirm that the sent email includes the PDF attachment.
Take a screenshot of the completion screen to capture the successful email distribution with PDF attachment.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Test email distribution functionality. Verify that users can send invoices via email, the email contains the PDF attachment, and the email delivery works correctly.

description: Test multiple export formats (JSON, CSV, XML). Verify that users can export invoice data in different formats, the exported files contain correct data, and downloads work properly.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to https://invoify.vercel.app to access the invoicing application.
Confirm that the invoice dashboard is displayed with the invoice data loaded.
Locate and click on the export invoice feature or button provided on the dashboard.
Verify that the export options are visible, showing choices for JSON, CSV, and XML formats.
Select the JSON export format option from the available choices.
Ensure that the JSON file downloads and contains the correct invoice data in the proper format.
Repeat the export process by selecting the CSV format option from the export menu.
Verify that the CSV file successfully downloads and that it correctly represents the invoice data.
Select the XML export format option to initiate the export of invoice data in XML format.
Confirm that the XML file is downloaded and that it contains accurate invoice data in the appropriate structure.
Review the download functionality to ensure each file format exports and downloads properly.
Take a screenshot of the completed export process to verify the final state of the application.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Test multiple export formats (JSON, CSV, XML). Verify that users can export invoice data in different formats, the exported files contain correct data, and downloads work properly.

description: Test language switching functionality. Verify that users can switch between different languages, the interface updates immediately, and all text elements are properly translated.

steps.stepDescription: Open the browser and navigate to the Invoify website at https://invoify.vercel.app.
Observe the default language of the interface and ensure the initial text elements are correctly displayed.
Locate and interact with the language switcher control on the page to display the available language options.
Select a different language from the available options to trigger the language switch.
Verify that the interface updates immediately after the language selection, with all text content translating accordingly.
Check that interactive elements, buttons, labels, and navigation items reflect the translated language properly.
Capture a screenshot of the updated interface to confirm that the language switching functionality worked as expected.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Test language switching functionality. Verify that users can switch between different languages, the interface updates immediately, and all text elements are properly translated.

description: Test currency support functionality. Verify that users can select different currencies, currency symbols display correctly, and currency formatting works properly in calculations.

steps.stepDescription: Open the invoify application in a web browser using the provided URL.
Identify the currency selection control on the home or dashboard page.
Choose a different currency option from the available selections.
Verify that the display updates to show the correct currency symbol.
Enter numeric values into an invoice or calculation field to check that currency formatting adjusts accordingly.
Confirm that invoice totals and related calculations reflect the chosen currency formatting correctly.
Capture a screenshot of the final currency display and formatting for validation purposes.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Test currency support functionality. Verify that users can select different currencies, currency symbols display correctly, and currency formatting works properly in calculations.

description: Test date formatting for different locales. Verify that date formats change appropriately when switching languages, and dates display correctly in the invoice templates.

steps.stepDescription: Open the web browser and navigate to https://invoify.vercel.app.
Confirm that the home page loads successfully and displays the expected content.
Locate the language selection control on the page.
Switch the application to a different language locale, for example, French or Spanish.
Wait for the page to update and verify that all date formats change to match the selected locale.
Navigate to the invoice template section to review the displayed dates.
Check that the dates in the invoice template are formatted correctly according to the active locale.
Capture a screenshot of the invoice template to confirm the correct date formatting.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Test date formatting for different locales. Verify that date formats change appropriately when switching languages, and dates display correctly in the invoice templates.

description: Test responsive design functionality. Verify that the application works correctly on different screen sizes, elements adapt properly, and the interface remains usable on mobile devices.

steps.stepDescription: Open the web browser and navigate to https://invoify.vercel.app on a desktop.
Verify that the application elements are correctly displayed in the desktop layout.
Resize the browser window to a tablet resolution and observe if the layout adapts properly.
Change the screen size to a mobile resolution to ensure that the user interface remains usable and elements adjust appropriately.
Interact with responsive elements such as the navigation menu or hamburger icon on the mobile view to confirm functionality.
Scroll through the mobile view to ensure that all content is accessible and displays correctly.
Take a screenshot of the responsive layout on mobile to document the final visual state.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Test responsive design functionality. Verify that the application works correctly on different screen sizes, elements adapt properly, and the interface remains usable on mobile devices.

description: Test theme switching functionality. Verify that users can switch between light and dark themes, the interface updates immediately, and all elements are properly styled in both themes.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to the URL https://invoify.vercel.app
Wait for the homepage to fully load and ensure the default (light) theme is applied
Inspect the initial interface elements to confirm they display with the expected light theme styling
Locate the theme toggle control on the interface that allows switching themes
Activate the theme toggle to switch the interface from light to dark theme
Verify that the interface updates immediately and all elements are styled according to the dark theme
Examine key visual components such as text, backgrounds, and buttons to ensure proper dark theme styling is applied
Toggle the theme control again to revert from dark theme back to light theme
Confirm that the interface immediately reverts to the light theme with all elements reflecting the correct styling
Take a screenshot of the final state to document the successful theme switching

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Test theme switching functionality. Verify that users can switch between light and dark themes, the interface updates immediately, and all elements are properly styled in both themes.

description: Test form validation and error handling. Verify that form validation works correctly, error messages display properly, and users receive appropriate feedback for invalid inputs.

steps.stepDescription: Launch the web browser and navigate to the URL https://invoify.vercel.app
Ensure that the form is visible on the landing page and all necessary fields are present
Enter invalid data into the required form fields to trigger validation errors
Submit the form with the invalid inputs to check the error handling mechanism
Verify that the appropriate error messages are displayed for each invalid input
Review the error feedback to ensure that it clearly instructs users on correcting the mistakes
Enter valid data into the previously invalid fields to remove error conditions
Resubmit the form and confirm that no error messages are shown and validation passes successfully
Capture a screenshot of the form's final state to ensure successful completion of the test

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Test form validation and error handling. Verify that form validation works correctly, error messages display properly, and users receive appropriate feedback for invalid inputs.
